messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition required for the spell to take effect?
The caster must succeed in an opposed POW roll with the target.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the resurrected entity if the caster wins the POW roll?
The victim returns to dust.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a possible effect of the victim if the spell is cast?
1/1D6 Sanity loss
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is an alternative name for the spell?
Rite of Salts
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the cost of casting the Song of Hastur in terms of magic points?
1D4 magic points per round
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is an alternative name for 'In The Case of Charles Dexter Ward'?
The Rite of Knowledge Long Lost
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of the 'Song of Hastur' on the victim's Sanity?
1D4 Sanity points per round
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many rounds does it take for the 'Song of Hastur' to begin taking effect?
3 rounds
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of the 'Song of Hastur' on the victim's skin and flesh?
Bubble and fester into pestilent blobs
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition for the spell to work?
The spell will not work except at night and only if the star Aldebaran is visible.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the spell affect the target's APP after every two rounds?
Scarring reduces the victim's APP by 3D10.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the victim's CON after every four rounds of the song?
internal ruptures lower the victim’s CON by 3D10
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when a caster uses the song to defend against another caster?
Successful opposing castings neutralize each other
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of a bound spell's failure?
it attacks the caster and then returns from whence it came
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the bound spell after it gives one order to the thing?
it is freed and returns from whence it came
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When does the body swell up and burst with steamy gore after the victim's CON reaches 0?
When the victim's CON reaches 0 or death occurs from hit point loss.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when two casters use this song spell against each other?
Successful opposing castings neutralize each other.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a bound thing after it obeys one order by the caster?
It is freed and returns from whence it came.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When can the Deeper Version of the song spell be cast?
When Aldebaran is not visible in the night sky, due to the caster's clarity of understanding and tuning to the mysteries of Hastur.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the thing after it obeys the order by the caster?
it is freed and returns from whence it came
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Under what condition can the spell be cast?
when Aldebaran is not visible in the night sky
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is required to create an echo of the song on a piece of cloth?
20 magic points invested into the pale material
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many rounds does the victim suffer the effects of the spell for?
10 rounds
